item.description:
IBIZA NIGHTS PRESENT THE SPIRIT OF KING SHANGO

SHANGO,God of Thunder, Drums and Dance, having been elevated from being a famous warrior and the fourth King of the Yoruba.

PRESENT BY IBIZA NIGHTS THIS PARTY IS A TRIP IN TO THE AFRICAN MYTHOLOGY,A TRIP IN TO THE SOUND AND LIGHTS,COME WITH US AND EXPERIENCE THIS MUSICAL JOURNEY.ABY(K) AS YOUR DJ RESIDENT,TRIBAL MINIMAL TECH HOUSE .

Modern DÃ©cor, warm earth tones and subtle changing Led lights make STIX Lounge THE PERFECT SPOT FOR OUR PARTY
